data.title: Manhattan Associates's Marketing Agencies And Projects On Agency Spotter
data.meta_description: Manhattan Associates's 6 advertising, marketing, design and digital agencies, plus projects and agency relationship insights.
data.text:
Blue Marble | A Video Agency

Video Production

A FULL SERVICE VIDEO AND ANIMATION BOUTIQUE - Blue Marble creates videos that get results. Clients love us for our creative quality and stick around for easy-to-work with attitude and process. We do it all: develop strategies and concepts, write scripts, design and storyboard, direct and produce shoots, edit and animate. Or, bring us your script and we'll make it shine. Founded in 1995, we've won hundreds of national and international awards for our video, film and motion graphics work. You'll recognize many of our clients from the Fortune 500. Our video crews have shot on nearly every continent. Give us a call. We're happy to brainstorm anytime.

Sherlock Communications

Public Relations

ABOUT US - Sherlock Communications is an award-winning Brazilian and Latin American PR and digital marketing agency. Headquartered in São Paulo, the company also has bureaus in Mexico City, Bogota, Buenos Aires, Lima, Santiago, Panama City and San José. With a totally bi-lingual, multidisciplinary team, Sherlock Communications is specialised in supporting international technology, services, lifestyle and travel companies operating in Latin America. The agency has won and been highly commended for a range of global awards including the SABRE Awards Latin America, Best Technology Campaign and Marketing to Consumer (New Product) and the PR Week Global Awards, Best Campaign in Latin America.

Neo PR

Public Relations

ABOUT US - Public and Media Relations to the business technology industry Here at Neo PR, we consider ourselves an extension of your team, not just an outsourced PR. From our experience in providing business-to-business public and media relations services to our technology and new media clients, we believe that you get the best results when you insource the team best suited and able to provide you with the additional resource to help generate sales leads. This is why Neo PR stands for Value. We work in close partnership with our clients to understand what makes you successful so that the PR campaigns we generate guarantee results and deliver tangible sales value. Our results-driven PR campaigns are open and transparent; we provide performance metrics and agree targets to ensure our campaigns stay focused on those aspects of your business that provide real results and real value. We take pride in delivering dynamic PR campaigns that make a positive difference to your brand and your business. Our approach is solid, proven and successful. Our ideas for PR content are fresh and innovative, and based upon keeping you at the forefront of your industry. Our values and ethos are unique. Insource a PR team that will work as One with you; insource Neo PR.

Standard Press

Direct Marketing

ABOUT US - As the oldest independent printer in Atlanta, Standard Press opened in 1932 and today remains a family-owned business in its third generation of management. Celebrating 84 years in business, Standard Press integrates new tools and solutions in order to better serve the needs of our clients. From investments in equipment to ensuring our team is aware of the latest industry trends, Standard Press works tirelessly to help our customers achieve their marketing and sales goals while maintaining our philosophy of delivering the highest standards of customer service.
